description: Canonical Mapping for "Codes providing the status/availability of a specimen."
name: SpecimenStatusCanonicalMap

text.div:
SpecimenStatusCanonicalMap (http://hl7.org/fhir/ConceptMap/sc-specimen-status)

Mapping from http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/specimen-status to http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/resource-status

DRAFT. Published on 20/08/2020 5:41:31 PM by HL7 (FHIR Project) (http://hl7.org/fhir, fhir@lists.hl7.org).

Canonical Mapping for "Codes providing the status/availability of a specimen."


Source CodeRelationshipDestination Code
entered-in-erroris equivalent toerror
availableis equivalent toactive
unsatisfactoryis equivalent tofailed
unavailableis equivalent toinactive

title: Canonical Mapping for "SpecimenStatus"
